member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.UnPremultiplyEffect
member.summary: Converts an image from premultiplied to unpremultiplied alpha format.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Unpremultiply effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.UnPremultiplyEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the UnPremultiplyEffect class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.UnPremultiplyEffect.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the input source for UnPremultiply effect.
member.remarks: This property is initialized to null.
